news.title: Karnataka High Court Digital Infrastructure Upgrade
news.content: The Karnataka High Court has announced a comprehensive digital infrastructure upgrade, including high-speed internet, digital case management, and virtual hearing facilities to enhance judicial efficiency and accessibility.

news.title: IT Sector Employment Rights Guidelines
news.content: The Karnataka High Court has issued detailed guidelines for employment rights in the IT sector, addressing work-from-home policies, overtime compensation, and dispute resolution mechanisms specific to the technology industry.

news.title: Urban Development and Environmental Balance
news.content: The Karnataka High Court has provided crucial directives on maintaining environmental balance during urban development projects in Bangalore, emphasizing sustainable construction practices and green building norms.
